title: Children, Don't Play With Ghosts!
alternative_title: 霊と遊ぶな子供たち！！ ; Rei to Asobuna Kodomo-tachi! !
status: 霊と遊ぶな子供たち！！ ; Rei to Asobuna Kodomo-tachi! !
description:
Description :
        7 scary stories by Inuki Kanako (4.1 and 4.2 were adapted into a movie, check Gokiburi no Ie's page for more info)
1- Ushirogami:
2- Psycho Box:
3- Children, Don't Play with Ghosts!: The mangaka, Kanako Inuki, tells some of her own scary experiences with ghost stories in childhood.
4- Women of the Dark (Kurayami no Onna-tachi)
4.1- Room 1: Woman that Loves Cooking
4.2- Room 2: Women in the Trash Dumping Area
4.3- Room 3: 117th Woman
5- The House of Cockroaches: A rich woman has a deathly fear of cockroaches which leads to...
6- Nightmare Door: A girl experiences strange and horrifying nightmares.
7- 100 Ghost Stories

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 4.2: Room 2: The Women Of The Garbage Storage
Vol.1 Chapter 4.1: Room 1: A Woman Who Loves Cooking
